meta.description: Wireframes in this XSLT framework are what would be called templates in any other CMS. They can be chosen in the page XML.

content.p: All page wireframes are stored in the xslt folder. Individual page selects a particular wireframe to use, in the ?xml-stylesheet declaration. This is done as follows:
You can add as many wireframes as you like, and apply them to individual pages in this way.
